definition: fragrant/sweet smelling/aromatic/savory or appetizing/(to eat) with relish/(of sleep) sound/perfume or spice/joss or incense stick/CL:根[gen1]

sentences.english: I don't like fish skin -- not seared or crispy.
sentences.chinese: 我不喜欢鱼皮，不管是烤的还是香酥的。

sentences.english: The special of our restaurant is Crispy Duck.
sentences.chinese: 本店的特色菜是香酥鸭。

sentences.english: Small sweet crisp duck hall this shop overall was quite good.
sentences.chinese: 小爽香酥烤鸭馆这间店总体来说还是很不错的。

sentences.english: Crispy pieces of real apple baked to perfection. The snack nature intended.
sentences.chinese: 纯正苹果，完美烘焙，松脆香酥，零食原本就该这样。

sentences.english: Our restaurant's special is crispy duck.
sentences.chinese: 本店的特色菜是香酥鸭。

definition: loose (soil, or limbs of a relaxed person etc)/flaky (pastry etc)
crispy/thin and brittle/a crispy fried cracker
five spice seasoned/incorporating the five basic flavors of Chinese cooking (sweet, sour, bitter, savory, salty)
